author: artipara
pages:
This is the Garden of
the Prophet Issah,
who sought to survive
the apocalypse by
means of salvation in
Eden.

Below the Garden lies
the key to immortality,
locked away until the
end of days. There
are four lanterns at
each end of this
garden that will grant
passage into our
great Eden below.

Each lantern requires
a single sacrifice. For
others to reach Eden,
four people must
remain behind. Those
who remain behind will
not survive.

Let this be a
challange to anyone
seeking salvation, and
an exercise in the
futility of human
cooporation...
